definition: a noise, tumult, crowd; also disquietude, wealth
kjvTranslation: abundance, company, many, multitude, multiply, noise, riches, rumbling, sounding, store, tumult.

translations.bg: шум, врява, тълпа; също безпокойство, богатство
translations.cs: hluk, vřava, dav; také neklid, bohatství
translations.da: en støj, tumult, menneskemængde; også uro, rigdom
translations.de: lärm, Tumult, Menschenmenge; auch Unruhe, Reichtum
translations.el: θόρυβος, αναταραχή, πλήθος, επίσης ανησυχία, πλούτος
translations.es: ruido, tumulto, muchedumbre; también inquietud, riqueza
translations.et: müra, rahutus, rahvahulk; ka rahutus, rikkus
translations.fi: melu, kuohunta, väkijoukko; myös levottomuus, rikkaus
translations.fr: bruit, tumulte, foule ; également inquiétude, richesse
translations.hu: zaj, tumultus, tömeg; továbbá nyugtalanság, gazdagság
translations.id: kebisingan, keributan, keramaian; juga kegelisahan, kekayaan
translations.it: un rumore, un tumulto, una folla; anche inquietudine, ricchezza
translations.ja: 喧噪、騒然、群衆；また、不穏、富裕
translations.ko: 소음, 소란, 군중; 또한 불쾌감, 재물
translations.lt: triukšmas, šurmulys, minia; taip pat neramumas, turtas
translations.lv: troksnis, kņada, pūlis; arī nemiers, bagātība
translations.nb: bråk, tumult, folkemengde; også uro, rikdom
translations.nl: lawaai, tumult, menigte; ook onrust, rijkdom
translations.pl: hałas, wrzawa, tłum; także niepokój, bogactwo
translations.pt: barulho, tumulto, multidão; também inquietação, riqueza
translations.ro: zgomot, tumult, mulțime; de asemenea neliniște, bogăție
translations.ru: шум, суматоха, толпа; также беспокойство, богатство
translations.sk: hluk, zhon, dav; tiež nepokoj, bohatstvo
translations.sl: hrup, vrenje, množica; tudi nemir, bogastvo
translations.sv: ett buller, tumult, folkmassa; även orolighet, rikedom
translations.tr: gürültü, kargaşa, kalabalık; ayrıca huzursuzluk, zenginlik
translations.uk: шум, гамір, натовп; також неспокій, багатство
translations.zh: 喧哗、骚动、人群；也指骚乱、财富
